airConditionerMode.info: Allows for the control of the air conditioner.
Current mode of the air conditioner

supportedAcModes.info: Supported states for this air conditioner to be in

targetTemperature.info: Current temperature status of the air conditioner

airConditionerModeEnum.cool: The fan is in sleep mode to reduce noise

switch.info: Allows for the control of a switch device
A string representation of whether the switch is on or off

switchEnum.on: The value of the ``switch`` attribute if the switch is on
switchEnum.off: The value of the ``switch`` attribute if the switch is off

airPurifierFanMode.info: Maintains and sets the state of an air purifier's fan
The current mode of the air purifier fan, an enum of auto, low, medium, high, sleep, quiet or windFree

supportedAirPurifierFanModes.info: Supported states for this air purifier fan to be in

setAirPurifierFanMode.info: Set the air purifier fan's mode

arguements.descriptor: Set the air purifier fan's mode

airPurifierFanModeEnum.sleep: The fan is in sleep mode to reduce noise
airPurifierFanModeEnum.quiet: The fan is on quiet mode to reduce noise
airPurifierFanModeEnum.windFree: The fan is on wind free mode to reduce the feeling of cold air

tvocMeasurement.info: Measure total volatile organic compound levels

tvocLevel.info: The level of total volatile organic compounds detected

carbonDioxide.info: The level of carbon dioxide detected

dustSensor.info: Gets the reading of the dust sensor.

dustLevel.info: Current dust level -- also refered to as PM10, measured in micrograms per cubic meter

fineDustLevel.info: Current level of fine dust -- also refered to as PM2.5, measured in micrograms per cubic meter

veryFineDustLevel.info: Current level of fine dust -- also refered to as PM1.0, measured in micrograms per cubic meter

relativeHumidityMeasurement.info: Allow reading the relative humidity from devices that support it

humidity.info: A numerical representation of the relative humidity measurement taken by the device

temperatureMeasurement.info: Get the temperature from a Device that reports current temperature

temperature.info: A number that usually represents the current temperature

alarm.info: The Alarm skill allows for interacting with devices that serve as alarms
A string representation of whether the switch is on or off

alarmVolume.info: A string representation of the volume of the alarm

off.info: Turn the alarm (siren and strobe) off

setAlarmVolume.info: Set the volume of the alarm

arguements.descriptor: Set the volume of the alarm to "mute", "low", "medium", or "high"

siren.info: Sound the siren on the alarm

alarmVolumeEnum.both: if the alarm is strobing and sounding the alarm
alarmVolumeEnum.off: if the alarm is turned off
alarmVolumeEnum.siren: if the alarm is sounding the siren

battery.info: Defines that the device has a battery
An indication of the status of the battery

blindLevel.info: Allows for the control of the level of a blind.
A number that represents the current level as a function of being open, ``0-100`` in percent; 0 representing completely closed, and 100 representing completely open.

setBlindLevel.info: Set the blind level to the given value.

arguements.descriptor: The level to which the blind should be set, ``0-100`` in percent; 0 representing completely closed, and 100 representing completely open.

blind.info: Allows for the control of the blind.
A string representation of whether the blind is open or closed

pause.info: Pause opening or closing the blind

buttonEnum.swipe_right: The value if the button is swiped from left to right

camera.info: Allows for the control of a camera device

image.info: The latest image captured by the camera

video.info: The latest video captured by the camera

take.info: Take a picture with the camera - Return the image as binary data

takeTimelapse.info: Take a picture with the camera - Return the video as binary data

arguements.descriptor: The duration of the timelapse in seconds

chargingState.info: The current status of battery charging
The current charging state of the device

supportedChargingStates.info: The list of charging states that the device supports. Optional, defaults to all states if not set.

voltageMeasurement.info: Get the value of voltage measured from devices that support it

voltage.info: A number representing the current voltage measured

currentMeasurement.info: Get the value of electrical current measured from a device.

current.info: A number representing the current measured.

date.info: Current date as double number - format: YYYYMMdd

datetime.info: Current date and time as double number - format: YYYYMMddhhmm

time.info: Current time as double number - format: hhmm

timestamp.info: Current timestamp (return current unix time - unit: seconds with floating point)

delay.info: delay for a given amount of time

contactSensor.info: Allows reading the value of a contact sensor device

contact.info: The current state of the contact sensor

curtain.info: Allows for the control of the curtain.
A string representation of whether the curtain is open or closed

supportedCurtainCommands.info: Curtain commands supported by this instance of Curtain

pause.info: Pause opening or closing the curtain

dehumidifierMode.info: Allows for the control of the dehumidifier mode.

dishwasherMode.info: Allows for the control of the dishwasher mode.

arguements.descriptor: Set the dishwasher mode to "eco", "intense", "auto", "quick", "rinse", or "dry" mode

doorControl.info: Allow for the control of a door

door.info: The current state of the door

doorEnum.unknown: The current state of the door is unknown

arguements.descriptor: The email address of the recipient

sendMailWithFile.info: Send an email with an attachment

arguements.descriptor: The email address of the recipient
The path to the file to be attached

fanControl.info: Allows for the control of the fan.

fanSpeed.info: The current fan speed represented as a integer value. - unit: RPM

percent.info: The current fan speed represented as a percent value.

arguements.descriptor: Set the fan to this speed
The percent value to set the fan speed to.

feederOperatingState.info: Allows for the control of a feeder device.
The current state of the feeder.

feederPortion.info: Allows for the portion control of a feeder device.

feedPortion.info: A number that represents the portion (in grams, pounds, ounces, or servings) that will dispense.

setFeedPortion.info: Set the portion (in grams, pounds, ounces, or servings) that the feeder will dispense.

arguements.descriptor: The portion (in grams, pounds, ounces, or servings) to dispense.

gasMeter.info: Read the gas consumption of an energy metering device
the gas energy reported by the metering device. unit: kWh

gasMeterCalorific.info: a measure of the available heat energy, used as part of the calculation to convert gas volume to gas energy. - unit: kcal

gasMeterTime.info: The cumulative gas use time reported by the metering device. - unit: seconds

gasMeterVolume.info: the cumulative gas volume reported by the metering device. - unit: cubic meters

valve.info: Allows for the control of a valve device
A string representation of whether the valve is open or closed

valveEnum.closed: The value of the ``valve`` attribute if the valve is closed
valveEnum.open: The value of the ``valve`` attribute if the valve is open

humidifierMode.info: Maintains and sets the state of an humidifier

arguements.descriptor: Set the humidifier mode to "auto", "low", "medium", or "high" mode

irrigatorOperatingState.info: Allows for the control of a irrigator device.
The current state of the irrigator.

irrigatorPortion.info: Allows for the portion control of a irrigator device.

waterPortion.info: A number that represents the portion (in liters, milliliters, gallons, or ounces) that will dispense.

setWaterPortion.info: Set the portion (in liters, milliliters, gallons, or ounces) that the irrigator will dispense.

arguements.descriptor: The portion (in grams, pounds, ounces, or servings) to dispense.

leakSensor.info: A Device that senses water leakage

leakage.info: Whether or not water leakage was detected by the Device

colorControl.info: Allows for control of a color changing device by setting its hue, saturation, and color values

setColor.info: Sets the color based on the values passed in with the given map

arguements.descriptor: The color map supports the following key/value pairs:

setHue.info: Set the hue value of the color

arguements.descriptor: A number in the range ``0-100`` representing the hue as a value of percent

setSaturation.info: Set the saturation value of the color

arguements.descriptor: A number in the range ``0-100`` representing the saturation as a value of percent

switchLevel.info: Allows for the control of the level of a device like a light or a dimmer switch.

level.info: A number that represents the current level, usually ``0-100`` in percent

setLevel.info: Set the level to the given value. If the device supports being turned on and off then it will be turned on if ``level`` is greater than 0 and turned off if ``level`` is equal to 0.

arguements.descriptor: The level value, usually ``0-100`` in percent
The rate at which to change the level

lightLevel.info: A numerical representation of the brightness intensity

menu.info: Get the menu - Return the menu list

arguements.descriptor: The command to get the menu - format: [오늘|내일] [학생식당|수의대식당|전망대(3식당)|예술계식당(아름드리)|기숙사식당|아워홈|동원관식당(113동)|웰스토리(220동)|투굿(공대간이식당)|자하연식당|301동식당] [아침|점심|저녁]

todayMenu.info: Get today's menu randomly - Return the menu list

todayPlace.info: Get today's restaurant randomly - Return the restaurant name

motionSensor.info:
• active - The value when motion is detected
• inactive - The value when no motion is detected

motion.info: The current state of the motion sensor

presenceSensor.info: The ability to see the current status of a presence sensor device

presence.info: The current state of the presence sensor

pump.info: Allows for the control of a pump device
A string representation of whether the pump is open or closed

pumpEnum.closed: The value of the ``pump`` attribute if the pump is closed
pumpEnum.open: The value of the ``pump`` attribute if the pump is open

pumpOperationMode.info: Allows for setting the operation mode on a pump.

currentOperationMode.info: The current effective operation mode of the pump

operationMode.info: The operation mode of the pump

supportedOperationModes.info: Supported operation modes for this device to be in

arguements.descriptor: The operation mode to set the device to

pumpOperationModeEnum.normal: The pump is controlled by a setpoint.
pumpOperationModeEnum.minimum: This value sets the pump to run at the minimum possible speed it can without being stopped.
pumpOperationModeEnum.maximum: This value sets the pump to run at its maximum possible speed.
pumpOperationModeEnum.localSetting: This value sets the pump to run with the local settings of the pump.

refrigeration.info: Allows for the control of the refrigeration.

setDefrost.info: Sets the defrost on or off

arguements.descriptor: The on or off value for the defrost

setRapidCooling.info: Sets the rapid cooling on or off

arguements.descriptor: The on or off value for the rapid cooling

setRapidFreezing.info: Sets the rapid freezing on or off

arguements.descriptor: The on or off value for the rapid freezing

rapidFreezingEnum.on: The value of the ``defrost``, ``rapidCooling``, ``rapidFreezing`` attribute if the defrost, rapidCooling, rapidFreezing is on
rapidFreezingEnum.off: The value of the ``defrost``, ``rapidCooling``, ``rapidFreezing`` attribute if the defrost, rapidCooling, rapidFreezing is off

robotCleanerCleaningModeEnum.stop: The robot cleaner cleaning mode is in "stop" mode
robotCleanerCleaningModeEnum.map: The robot cleaner cleaning mode is in "map" mode

windowShade.info: Allows for the control of the window shade.

windowShade.info: A string representation of whether the window shade is open or closed

pause.info: Pause opening or closing the window shade

sirenMode.info: Allows for the control of the siren.

powerMeter.info: Allows for reading the power consumption from devices that report it

power.info: A number representing the current power consumption. Check the device documentation for how this value is reported - unit: Watts

powerConsumption.info: energy and power consumption during specific time period - unit: Wh

smoke.info: The state of the smoke detection device

mediaPlaybackEnum.buffering: Media playback is in a "buffering" state

window.info: A string representation of whether the window is open or closed
